legal_basis: sections 96 and 97 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
state_protection_analysis: operational adequacy of state protection against fascist violence
reasonableness_standard: unreasonable as it failed to adequately address the operational effectiveness of Hungary's protective measures
risk_of_persecution: fear of persecution in Hungary due to her Roma ethnicity
country_conditions: efforts to combat discrimination in Hungary
burden_of_proof: claimant must demonstrate a well-founded fear of persecution or risk to life
review_standard: judicial review of the RPD's decision
